settings.text: Our wooden clog story begun in 1846, where the art of crafting wooden clogs became our heritage in Sweden.

Discover Sandgrens wooden clog bases, meticulously carved from premium European limewood and Spanish pine wood. Renowned for their durability and comfort, our wooden bases embrace your feet with natural warmth and strength, making them the perfect choice for long-lasting footwear. Each piece is expertly crafted in Croatia and Spain, reflecting the highest standards of European craftsmanship.

Beneath every wooden base, you'll find our high-quality rubber soles, designed to offer unparalleled traction and support. This ensures you can step confidently on any terrain, combining the beauty of traditional wooden clogs with modern functionality.

settings.title: Low heel
settings.text: Discover our low heel wooden clog base. Crafted from premium european lime wood, these bases offer exceptional durability and a lightweight feel, ensuring all-day comfort.

settings.title: High heel
settings.text: Our high heel wooden clog base is, like our low heel, made from european lime wood, this base combine elegance with strength, providing a stable and stylish platform for your feet to rest on.

settings.title: High rise heel
settings.text: Our high rise heel wooden clog base is handcrafted from the finest spanish pine wood. Spanish pine wood is known for its resilience and distinctive grain, ensuring each base is as durable as it is beautiful.

Express your individuality with our diverse color options. Choose from the timeless elegance of dark, the understated charm of light, or the classic versatility of black. Each base is thoughtfully designed to complement your wardrobe, allowing you to curate your own signature style.

settings.title: Light base
settings.text: Crafted from high-quality wood with a light finish, these bases exude a sense of natural beauty and tranquility. Each piece is unique, showcasing the organic grain patterns and subtle variations that add character to your surroundings.

settings.title: Dark base
settings.text: Crafted from exquisite wood with a deep, lustrous finish, these bases radiate elegance and refinement. Each piece is meticulously crafted to showcase the natural beauty of the wood, with intricate grain patterns and a luxurious sheen that captivates the eye.

settings.title: Black base
settings.text: Our black base collection was born from the idea of using wood bases that don't qualify for light or dark base because of marks from the tree. We are able to reduce our waste by turning them into black bases.

At the heart of our clog designs lies a commitment to quality, reflected in the careful selection of our premium leathers. Each leather type embodies its own unique characteristics, ensuring a personalized experience for every wearer. From the timeless elegance of vegetable tanned leather, to the luxurious softness of nubuck leather and the bold statement of our traditional leather with metallic foil, our range caters to diverse tastes and preferences. Explore the essence of fine craftsmanship as we unveil the details of our chosen leathers below.

settings.heading: Vegetable tanned leather
settings.row_content:
Our chrome-free vegetable tanned leather is a testament to both environmental consciousness and timeless craftsmanship. Through a natural and chemical-free tanning process, this leather is artfully created using tree bark, vegetables, and fruits. This eco-friendly method not only ensures a gentle touch on the environment but also aligns seamlessly with our dedication to sustainable choices.

In its initial state, vegetable tanned leather may present a firmer texture compared to chemically dyed counterparts. However, this characteristic transforms into a distinctive feature as the leather softens with the passage of time, offering a personalized touch with every use.

With chrome-free vegetable tanned leather, you not only embrace an eco-conscious choice but also invest in a material that evolves gracefully, reflecting the values of slow fashion and enduring quality.

settings.heading: Nubuck top grain leather
settings.row_content:
Top grain leather stands as a testament to the epitome of quality and refinement in the world of leather goods.

Known for its durability and resilience, top grain leather undergoes a meticulous tanning process that maintains the integrity of the hide while ensuring a soft and supple feel. Unlike full-grain leather, top grain leather may undergo minimal sanding or buffing to remove imperfections, resulting in a smooth and uniform surface.

Appreciated for its balance between durability and aesthetics, top grain leather caters to those who seek a combination of sophistication and practicality. As a material that ages gracefully, top grain leather not only withstands the test of time but also gains a unique charm, making it a timeless investment for those who value both quality and style.

settings.heading: Traditional leather
settings.row_content:
Our genuine leather with foil finish represents a unique fusion of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary aesthetics. In this process, real animal hide is carefully treated and adorned with a thin layer of foil, creating a distinctive surface that combines durability with an eye-catching visual appeal.

The application of foil to the leather serves multiple purposes. Beyond its decorative function, the foil contributes to the leather's protective qualities, enhancing its resistance to wear and tear. The result is a leather product that not only looks refined but also stands up to the rigors of everyday use.

settings.heading: THE UNIQUE TOUCH OF OUR ECRU LEATHER

settings.text: Ecru, derived from the French word "écru" meaning "raw," is a natural, untreated hue that brings understated elegance to your footwear. This unique color develops a graceful patina over time, narrating its journey and adding character to your shoes. The natural aging process not only enhances their aesthetic appeal but also highlights the authenticity of the material.
